meanings.definition: A North American evergreen plant with white or pink flowers.
meanings.sent1: The pipsissewa grows in the forest.
meanings.sent2: I saw a beautiful pipsissewa in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The pipsissewa decided to wear a tiny hat made of leaves.
meanings.sent4: Her smile bloomed like a pipsissewa in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The delicate petals of the pipsissewa danced in the breeze.

meanings.definition: The dried leaves of the pipsissewa plant used in herbal medicine.
meanings.sent1: She brewed a tea with pipsissewa to help with her cold.
meanings.sent2: The pipsissewa leaves have a pleasant aroma when dried.
meanings.sent3: The pipsissewa leaves whispered ancient herbal secrets to the other plants.
meanings.sent4: His knowledge of plants was a pipsissewa in the field of medicine.
meanings.sent5: The healing power of pipsissewa leaves was known far and wide.
